issues.check: T048 referenced in features.md F5 and user_stories.md US-11 but absent from tasks.md

issues.check: T011 description in tasks.md matches phase1_foundation.md
issues.description: tasks.md described T011 as 'TypeScript config and dev/build scripts' while phase1_foundation.md defines T011 as 'EventEmitter Utility'. These are entirely different deliverables; a vanilla JS project does not need a TypeScript config.
issues.fix_description: Updated tasks.md T011 to 'EventEmitter utility class', matching the authoritative phase doc.

issues.check: T012 description in tasks.md matches phase1_foundation.md
issues.description: tasks.md described T012 as 'Git ignore and workspace structure' while phase1_foundation.md defines T012 as 'Task Data Model and ID Generator'. Git ignore work is implicitly part of T010 (project scaffold).
issues.fix_description: Updated tasks.md T012 to 'Task data model and createTask() factory', matching the authoritative phase doc.

issues.description: T033 (Enhanced task card creation — particle burst on spawn) was listed in Phase 2.2 (Card Reflow) but carries 'depends: T027, T039'. T039 (Particle burst effect) is in Phase 2.3, meaning T033 had a forward dependency on T039, making the Phase 2.2 listing unimplementable in order.
issues.fix_description: Moved T033 from Phase 2.2 to the end of Phase 2.3 in tasks.md, after T040, so it comes after all its dependencies (T027 from Phase 1, T039 from Phase 2.3).

issues.check: US-22 task references match features.md F10
issues.description: user_stories.md traceability matrix and US-22 body both listed tasks as T015, T026. But features.md F10 lists T015, T016. issues.fix_description: Updated user_stories.md US-22 traceability row and story body from 'T015, T026' to 'T015, T016', consistent with features.md F10.

issues.check: T124 (keyboard accessibility) missing from features.md F10 task list
issues.description: user_stories.md US-21 references T124 for the F10 feature, but features.md F10 task list only included T015 and T016. T124 ('Keyboard Accessibility and DOM Fallback List') is a Phase 5 task that directly fulfills F10's graceful-degradation goal.
